alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 1:32PM CST until March 05 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Poteau affecting Le Flore County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, moderate flooding of agricultural lands occur from Panama to Arkoma. Some local and county roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 29.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 34.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
